Advantech
Intelligent Retail: Digital Transformation for the Retail Industry
Overview
Advantech is a globally leading industrial manufacturer of IPCs. Advantech is intent on building its brand in Internet of Things (IoT) and Smart Retail markets. To advance this goal, Advantech is developing it’s UShop+ application, which combines online, cloud, and IoT strategies to supercharge online and online-to-offline (O2O) retailers. UShop+ provides big data business intelligence and sales insight to small and large retailers alike. UShop+ is powered by an interface designed and developed by Cloud Interactive.
The New Era of Intelligent Retail
Retailers face a multitude of problems, from single store sales, inventory management, warehousing, logistics, to overall operations issues. A retailer’s business thrives or falters based on customer experience alone: pre-sales service, shopping experience, and after-sales relationship management are all integral to a retail enterprise’s success. In today’s retail sales industry, the key to business development is to use big data effectively.
UShop+: An Intelligent Retail Solution
Advantech’s Smart Retail strategy focuses on vertical markets such as chain stores, food business, hypermarkets and shopping malls to help retailers become leaders in their own markets. Advantech themselves researched in-detail the background and pain points of retailers. Insights gleaned from this research was used as the foundation of their comprehensive cloud retail service platform：“Ushop+”.The UShop+ platform includes Customer Engagement and B2B Business Management solutions to improve retailors’ operational efficiency and deliver exciting new shopping experiences.
One-Stop Service to Optimize User Experience
UShop+ includes a powerful suite of business intelligence tools, which includes in-depth analysis, reporting, and customizable dashboards. These tools empower UShop+ users to rapidly develop business opportunities.Cloud Interactive brings these tools to life with streamlined interface design and innovative data visualization.
An Innovative Retail Experience
UShop+ integrates a variety of cutting-edge retail systems, including PoS hardware, RFID modules, and interactive electronic billboards into a single cohesive system. Data collected from these devices allows retails to understand customer needs and behaviors, expand sales revenue, reduce operating costs, and enhance the overall shopping experience.UShop+ features interactions developed by Cloud Interactive. Workflows within UShop+ have been tuned to meet every user’s role, responsibilities, and job tasks. Thanks to this interface, this multitude of collected data is easily manageable, and can be used to rapidly inform business decisions.For more information: UShop+
